data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khaustov, Alexander A., Frolov, Andrey V. (2019): Revision of the genus Athyreacarus (Acari: Athyreacaridae). Zootaxa 4647 (1): 168-225, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4647.1.14|51 occurrences
